title: PMS 2.0 517 - Thursday Night Football Recap, NFL Week 6 Preview, Matt "Cass Dogg" Cassel, Coach Jason Brown, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys chat about last night's Thursday Night Football game between the Bucs and the Eagles, the Same Game Parlay getting absolutely shafted by Tom Brady kneel downs at the end of the game, if we can trust betting on the Bucs, and if there is much process for Nick Sirianni and the Eagles. Next, Pat and AJ Hawk go through the entire week 6 NFL slate and make their picks against the spread. Later, NFL legend, NFL QB for 14 years, the Cass Dogg, Matt Cassel, joins the show. Cass Dogg chats about whether or not guys can improve accuracy once they get into the league, and he tells some hilarious stories of old prank wars between him and Tom Brady (1:13:48-1:27:54). And to close out the show, Pat, Coach JB, and AJ chat about everything going on in college football, he makes his picks for the weekend, and chats about Jon Gruden's exit in Las Vegas, his thoughts on Schefter being linked to everything else now, and much more (1:33:34-1:58:59). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
